metadata.title: CVE-2019-9087 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
HotelDruid before v2.3.1 has SQL Injection via the /tab_tariffe.phpnumtariffa1 parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hoteldruid - 2.3.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.2-1').
